attributes.action: The public calls for vote of no confidence in the UK government
attributes.additional_details: I fell the public should decide in the new government rather then uk  parliament as   pretty much more members  of the public is now feeling fed up of the failings of the Conservative Party due to their handing over the last few month's. Also it should be  members of society to decide when we get new governments not the government it self.
attributes.background: Immediately  dissolve the government and call for a new General election . As the public had enough of off of the government's Handling of covid-19,  the  pay conditions  of the NHS key workers and the way they've been handling racism.
